text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(minithemes) library(dplyr) library(ggplot2)  # Showing automated grid lines, Dubois key glyphs, and Dubois palette. mtcars |>   mutate(cyl = factor(cyl)) |>   ggplot(aes(mpg, cyl, fill = cyl)) +   geom_boxplot(key_glyph = "dubois") +   theme_mini() +   scale_fill_dubois() # Conditional grid lines toggle for both orientations. mtcars |>   mutate(cyl = factor(cyl)) |>   ggplot(aes(cyl, mpg, fill = cyl)) +   geom_boxplot(key_glyph = "dubois") +   theme_mini() +   scale_fill_dubois()
